p: Adaptive selection pressures within the HA1 domain were inferred from the ratio of non-synonymous to synonymous changes (dN/dS) using methods available in Datamonkey web server [ 36]. Selection pressure across the HA1 (mean dN/dS = Ï‰) and specific codon sites were estimated by the single likelihood ancestor counting (SLAC) and fixed effects likelihood (FEL) methods [ 37]. The dN/dS ratio was calculated based on neighbor-joining trees under the HKY85 substitution model [ 38]. Strong evidence of selection was accepted at a P-value <0.05.
